admission_policy.description: This show is suitable for all ages. Children under 5 must be accompanied by an adult.

description.summary1: Step into a magical world where your favorite Disney characters come to life on ice in DISNEY ON ICE – LET’S DANCE 2025! This spectacular musical theatre experience brings together dazzling skating, enchanting storytelling, and breathtaking choreography that will delight audiences of all ages.
description.summary2: Join Mickey, Minnie, and an unforgettable cast of Disney friends as they take you on a journey filled with laughter, adventure, and heartwarming moments. From the whimsical streets of Arendelle with Elsa and Anna, to the vibrant energy of Zootopia, and the timeless magic of Cinderella and The Lion King, every scene is a celebration of music, movement, and imagination.
description.summary3: Featuring state-of-the-art lighting, vibrant costumes, and stunning ice artistry, LET’S DANCE 2025 is more than just a show — it’s a fully immersive experience. Watch in awe as skaters glide and spin in perfect harmony with Disney’s most beloved songs, performing breathtaking routines that combine athleticism with artistry.
description.summary4: Perfect for families, friends, and Disney fans of all ages, this show promises to leave you smiling, singing, and dancing along. Whether it’s your first Disney experience on ice or a cherished tradition, DISNEY ON ICE – LET’S DANCE 2025 delivers unforgettable memories, magical moments, and a celebration of the joy of dance, music, and imagination.
details: Immersive lighting, vibrant costumes, and choreographed routines.
Family-friendly celebration of music, dance, and imagination.
